DOC.brief_summary: The objective study demonstrate correlation near vision change high order aberration follow lens extraction characterize defocus curve Crystalens® AO™ intraocular lens ( IOL ) versus monofocal aspheric SofPort® LI61AO IOL adult .
DOC.brief_title: Accommodation Measurements After Bilateral Implantation Aspheric Accommodating Lens Monofocal Aspheric Lenses
DOC.criteria: Subjects must clear intraocular medium cataract . Subjects must clinically document diagnosis agerelated bilateral cataract consider amenable treatment standard phacoemulsification cataract extraction . Subjects must undergo primary IOL implantation correction aphakia follow central continuous curvilinear anterior capsulorrhexis phacoemulsification cataract extraction . Subjects must require spherical lens power 10.00 D 30.00 D. Subjects must willing able return schedule followup examination eye day 1 180 follow surgery . Subjects must ≤ 1.25 D preoperative corneal astigmatism . Subjects corneal pathology potentially affect topography . Subjects whose fundus assess preoperatively . Subjects diagnose degenerative visual disorder ( eg , macular degeneration , retinal disorder ) cause potential acuity loss level bad 20/30 verified OCT . Subjects condition increase risk zonular rupture , pseudoexfoliation syndrome . Subjects active inflammation edema ( swell ) cornea , include limited following : keratitis , keratoconjunctivitis , keratouveitis . Subjects uncontrolled glaucoma . Subjects previous retinal detachment . Subjects visually significant diabetic retinopathy ( proliferative nonproliferative ) reduce potential acuity 20/30 worse . Subjects rubella , bilateral congenital , traumatic , complicate polar cataract . Subjects mark microphthalmos aniridia . Subjects previous corneal surgery . Subjects irregular corneal astigmatism . Subjects amblyopia reduces potential acuity bad 20/30 . Subjects optic atrophy . Subjects iris neovascularization . Subjects clinically significant retinal pigment epithelium/macular change reduce potential acuity 20/30 worse . Subjects chronic use systemic steroid immunosuppressive medication . Subjects lack intact binocular vision .
